docs.snippet: Four of the Republican presidential candidates actively campaigned in Iowa on Sunday, two days before the state's caucuses. This is what they were saying.

headline.main: On the Ground in Iowa, in Quotes

docs.snippet: Democratic Party operatives descended on Iowa to set up an anti-Romney war room and preview their strategy should Mitt Romney become the Republican nominee.
docs.lead_paragraph: DES MOINES -- Mitt Romney is fighting to be the top choice of Republicans here in Iowa, but he's already the top target for Democrats.
docs.abstract: Democratic Party operatives descended on Iowa to set up an anti-Romney war room and preview their strategy should Mitt Romney become the Republican nominee.

headline.main: Democrats Descend on Iowa to Hit Romney

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

docs.snippet: Mitt Romney keeps up with pop culture.
docs.lead_paragraph: COUNCIL BLUFFS, Iowa - Mitt Romney may not be able to keep up with the Kardashians, but he did manage to bring them into a speech here on Sunday night.
docs.abstract: Mitt Romney keeps up with pop culture.

headline.main: Mitt Romney Compares Obama to  the Kardashians

docs.snippet: Virginia's attorney general on Sunday backed off of a proposal to loosen the state's ballot access rules to allow more Republican presidential candidates to qualify.
docs.lead_paragraph: DES MOINES -- Virginia's attorney general on Sunday backed off of a proposal to loosen the state's ballot access rules to allow more Republican presidential candidates to qualify.
docs.abstract: Virginia's attorney general on Sunday backed off of a proposal to loosen the state's ballot access rules to allow more Republican presidential candidates to qualify.

headline.main: Virginia Attorney General Backs Off Ballot Proposal

docs.snippet: Newt Gingrich promised an aggressive and pointed response in New Hampshire and South Carolina to attack advertisements in Iowa by groups supporting Mitt Romney.
docs.abstract: Newt Gingrich promised an aggressive and pointed response in New Hampshire and South Carolina to attack advertisements in Iowa by groups supporting Mitt Romney.

docs.snippet: Newt Gingrich promised an aggressive and pointed response in New Hampshire and South Carolina to attack advertisements in Iowa by groups supporting Mitt Romney.
docs.lead_paragraph: MARSHALLTOWN, Iowa -- Newt Gingrich said he felt "Romney-boated" by attack advertisements from Mitt Romney's supporters -- a reference to the Swift Boat Veterans for Truth campaign that hurt Senator John Kerry's campaign in 2004 -- and promised an aggressive, pointed response in New Hampshire and South Carolina.
docs.abstract: Newt Gingrich promised an aggressive and pointed response in New Hampshire and South Carolina to attack advertisements in Iowa by groups supporting Mitt Romney.

docs.snippet: Mitt Romney notes that Rick Santorum endorsed him in 2008.
docs.abstract: Mitt Romney notes that Rick Santorum endorsed him in 2008.

headline.main: Romney Talks About  Santorum, a Bit Mischievously

docs.snippet: Mitt Romney notes that Rick Santorum endorsed him in 2008.
docs.lead_paragraph: ATLANTIC, Iowa - Mitt Romney offered his most extensive comments on his presidential rival Rick Santorum - a former senator from Pennsylvania who is experiencing a surge in the polls - when pressed by reporters during a question-and-answer session following an event here.
docs.abstract: Mitt Romney notes that Rick Santorum endorsed him in 2008.

headline.main: Romney Talks About  Santorum, a Bit Mischievously

docs.snippet: Newt Gingrich said on Sunday he intended to campaign in New Hampshire and will criticize Mitt Romney over an abortion provision in the Massachusetts health care program.
docs.lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. -- Newt Gingrich said on Sunday that he intended to campaign in New Hampshire, where polls show him running third, rather than move directly to South Carolina, where he is leading.
docs.abstract: Newt Gingrich said on Sunday he intended to campaign in New Hampshire and will criticize Mitt Romney over an abortion provision in the Massachusetts health care program.

headline.main: Gingrich to Take Aim at Romney in New Hampshire

docs.snippet: With two days before the Iowa caucuses, Newt Gingrich planned to visit three sports bars on New Year's Day.
docs.lead_paragraph: AMES, Iowa -- Where do you find voters on the last Sunday of the regular season of the National Football League?
docs.abstract: With two days before the Iowa caucuses, Newt Gingrich planned to visit three sports bars on New Year's Day.

headline.main: On a Big Football Weekend, Gingrich Makes His Plea to N.F.L. Fans
